page_link_with_code_guide_1: 1. On your phone, open the YouTube app.
page_link_with_code_guide_3: 3. Tap “Link with TV code” and enter the code below.
page_link_with_code_error_get_code: An error occurred while retrieving the code
page_link_with_wifi_guide_1: 1. On your phone, connect to the same Wi-Fi network as this device.
page_link_with_wifi_guide_2: 2. Open the YouTube app on your phone.
page_link_with_wifi_guide_3: 3. Tap the cast icon and select this device.
page_language_guide: This changes the language of the app. Videos remain in their original language unless the creator provides translations.
